人工智能增强了对肺癌患者辐射诱发心律失常风险的了解麻省总医院布里格姆医疗保健系统的创始成员之一布莱根妇女医院的研究人员使用人工智能工具来加速了解当心脏的不同部位暴露在不同阈值的辐射下时，特定心律失常的风险。肺癌的治疗计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/AI-enhances-understanding-of-radiation-induced-cardiac-athroythmia-risk-in-lung-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/AI-enhances-understanding-of-radiation-induced-cardiac-athroythmia-risk-in-lung-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5bd396d6-1808-4d7d-9d0c-90a60d0dd99d Tue, 27 Aug 2024 08:25:00 -0400 AI enhances understanding of radiation-induced cardiac arrhythmia risk in lung cancer patients

FDA 批准的阿尔茨海默病药物可诱导蝌蚪进入麻木状态哈佛大学维斯生物工程研究所的研究人员报告说，他们使用多奈哌齐（DNP）成功地使非洲爪蟾蝌蚪进入类似冬眠的麻木状态，多奈哌齐是 FDA 批准用于治疗阿尔茨海默氏症的药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/FDA-approved-Alzheimers-drug-induces-torpor-like-state-in-tadpoles.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/FDA-approved-Alzheimers-drug-induces-torpor-like-state-in-tadpoles.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33093f69-fe23-4e58-a538-9eff98efe7a5 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 08:11:00 -0400 FDA-approved Alzheimer's drug induces torpor-like state in tadpoles

MP Biomedicals宣布推出先进胃肠道疾病诊断试剂盒MP Biomedicals 通过基于免疫色谱的新型定性快速测试完善了其传染病体外诊断测试系列。MP Biomedicals 的新型诊断试剂盒利用尖端技术提供精确的结果，使医疗保健专业人员能够快速、准确地检测幽门螺杆菌、伤寒沙门氏菌和霍乱弧菌血清群 O1 和 O139。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/MP-Biomedicals-announces-the-launch-of-advanced-胃肠疾病-diagnostic-kits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/MP-Biomedicals-announces-the-launch-of-advanced-胃肠疾病-diagnostic-kits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47e95616-6122-4273-86ba-8b5e89782664 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 07:17:00 -0400 MP Biomedicals announces the launch of advanced gastrointestinal diseases diagnostic kits
